0110010110011000 1100011110010001 1 -> sum: 0010110100101010, cout: 1
0010000001001100 0111000111100100 1 -> sum: 1001001000110001, cout: 0
1101110110010100 1101011100110000 1 -> sum: 1011010011000101, cout: 1
0100100111111100 1010011001010011 0 -> sum: 1111000001001111, cout: 0
1000101010000110 0101100101100100 0 -> sum: 1110001111101010, cout: 0
0110100000111011 1011101000111111 0 -> sum: 0010001001111010, cout: 1
0000000000000000 0000000000000000 0 -> sum: 0000000000000000, cout: 0
1111111111111111 1111111111111111 1 -> sum: 1111111111111111, cout: 1
0000000000000000 1111111111111111 0 -> sum: 1111111111111111, cout: 0
